title: Having ping spikes all the time
body:
So for the last couple of months I've been having these crazy ping spikes and I was wondering why?

My specs are: 
Windows 10 Enterprise
2x intel xeon E5-2690 processors
16GB 1600Mhz ECC RAM
GTX 960 2GB graphics card
480GB SSD

For internet connectivity I use Cox and while I can browse the web normally or watch videos I get ping spikes in league. 

How do I maintain 80 ping?

replies.body: There could be a few for this like packet loss or your ISP's routing, meaning that there could be a network issue.  I recommend running a[ log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) of your games, which will give a solid overview of what's going on.  The results will also provide a list of steps to help tune up your connection.  Let me know if that helps!
